Name: Big Apple Sour Martini
Ingredients: 30 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of skewered Luxardo Maraschino Cherry &/or green apple slice/wedge.
Garnish with skewered cherry &/or green apple slice/wedge.
Review: A delicious and beautifully balanced apple sour, all the better when made with freshly pressed Granny Smith apple juice.
Nutrition: One serving of Big Apple Sour Martini contains 206 calories
